content: the usual suspects darning needle and scissors gauge 19 double_crochet x 11 row = 10×10 cm / 4×4 inches let s start hooking… front panel row 1 chain 84 104 looseley double_crochet in 8th chain from hook and in the next 7 chs chain 2 skip next 2 chs double_crochet in next 8 chs chain 2 skip next 2 chs twice 3 times double_crochet in next 14 chs chain 2 skip next 2 chs double_crochet in next 8 chs 3 4 times chain 2 skip next 2 chs double_crochet in final chain turn now you should have 8 10 chain-spaces 6 8 groups of 8 dcs 14 dcs in the middle plus 1 double_crochet at each end row 2 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next chain-space chain 2 skip next 2 sts double_crochet in next 6 sts 2 dcs in next chain- space 3 4 times chain 2 skip next 2 sts double_crochet in next 10 sts chain 2 skip next 2 dcs 2 double_crochet in next chain-space double_crochet in next 6 sts chain 2 skip next 2 sts 3 4 times 2 double_crochet in next chain-space double_crochet in final st turn 64 80 dcs + 8 10 chain-space s row 3 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next chain-space chain 2 skip next 2 sts double_crochet in next 6 sts 2 dcs in next chain-space 3 4 times chain 2 skip next 2 sts double_crochet in next 6 sts chain 2 skip next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next chain- space double_crochet in next 6 sts chain 2 skip next 2 sts 3 4 times 2 double_crochet in next chain-space double_crochet in final 3 sts turn row 4 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet in next 4 sts 2 double_crochet in next chain-space chain 2 skip next 2 sts double_crochet in next 6 sts 2 dcs in next chain-space 3 4 times chain 2 skip next 2 sts double_crochet in next 2 sts chain 2 skip next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next chain- space double_crochet in next 6 sts chain 2 skip next 2 sts 3 4 times 2 double_crochet in next chain-space double_crochet in final 5 sts turn 2 peaks tank top en ©anna erlandsson 2018 hookedbyanna com row 5 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet in next 6 sts 2 double_crochet in next chain-space chain 2 skip next 2 sts double_crochet in next 6 sts 2 dcs in next chain-space 3 4 times chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain-space double_crochet in next 6 sts chain 2 skip next 2 sts 3 4 times 2 double_crochet in next chain-space double_crochet in final 7 sts turn row 6 row 6 is essentially the same as row 1 chain 5 counts as first double_crochet + 2 chain skip next 2 sts double_crochet in next 6 sts 2 dcs in next chain-space chain 2 skip next 2 sts 3 4 times double_crochet in next 6
